title: The First Year of the Delivering for America Plan
description: In this episode, our hosts Dale and Yasmine are joined by Postmaster General, Louis DeJoy, to talk about the impacts seen across the Postal Service one year after implementing the Delivering for America (DFA) Plan. We’ll learn more about its impact on infrastructure, services offered, and opportunities for partnership growth. We’ll also talk about how leadership and strategic planning will continue to help us grow.
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
content:encoded: In this episode, our hosts Dale and Yasmine are joined by Postmaster General, Louis DeJoy, to talk about the impacts seen across the Postal Service one year after implementing the Delivering for America (DFA) Plan. We’ll learn more about its impact on infrastructure, services offered, and opportunities for partnership growth. We’ll also talk about how leadership and strategic planning will continue to help us grow.
itunes:title: The First Year of the Delivering for America Plan
itunes:author: United States Postal Service
itunes:summary: This week on Mailin' It, we’re joined by our Postmaster General, Louis DeJoy to talk about the Postal Service’s first year since implementing the Delivering for America Plan. We’ll learn more about how this 10-year transformation plan has impacted the Postal Service, plans for the future, and more!
itunes:subtitle: This week on Mailin' It, we’re joined by our Postmaster General, Louis DeJoy to talk about the Postal Service’s first year since implementing the Delivering for America Plan. We’ll learn more about how this 10-year transformation plan has impacted the Postal Service, plans for the future, and more!
itunes:keywords: usp postal service, shipping, delivering for america, packages, usps, mail, dfa, postal service
